description:
Iino Abbav grew up in the Side 1 colony Shangrila where he became friends with Judau Ashta, Leina Ashta, Elle Vianno, Mondo Agake, and Beecha Oleg. He made a living as a junk collector with Judau Ashta. Among his group of friends Iino is the most soft spoken and least confrontational. However he is loyal to his friends and will disobey any order in order to help them.
Source: gundam.wikia.com
name: Iino Abbav
